thread.section_title: InnoMax Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InnoMax | innomax.com
thread.title: JERRY VENO

author: JERRY VENO
title: JERRY VENO
text:
On the 2 or 3 occasions when I have had to call the store to speak to someone about an issue or question I had, I've always come away extremely pleased with the interaction. Recently I had accidentally broken a part on my air pump and I spoke with Mr Force about a replacement. He knew exactly what I was talking about, sent me the parts I needed with very clear instructions in how to install them, and at a very fair price.
I am extremely pleased with my bed purchase and the subsequent dealings with these folks reinforces in my mind that I made a very wise decision in buying my bed from Innomax!
